translation.en: This morning, we set sail for our next grand adventure, the Galapagos,
translation.it: Questa mattina abbiamo salpato all'avventura per le Galapagos

translation.en: and whatever extraordinary creatures await me on these islands.
translation.it: e le creature straordinarie che mi aspettano su queste isole.

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Ed? This is embarrassing. Um, but you have a little, um...
translation.it: Ed? Non so come dirtelo… Hai un…

translation.en: -Yeah, right there. You got it. -Uh, I know.
The other flummels are waiting for us.
So, we're late. What's the worst thing that could happen?
translation.it: Siamo in ritardo, che sarà mai?

translation.en: Listen up, flummels. The countdown to the Flower Festival has begun.
translation.it: Ascoltate. Il conto alla rovescia per il Festival dei Fiori è iniziato.

translation.en: Now, I know we don't have a lot of flowers, but--
But the ones we got are different, dynamic, and--
Weird. The flowers, you, your brother, all weird.
translation.it: Strambi. I fiori, tu, tuo fratello, tutto.

translation.en: That's why no one wants you around.
Well, Ed, we gave it a shot.
[scoffs] It's fine. I don't care what Mali thinks.
[chuckles] What are you talking about? You care what everybody thinks.
Not right now, because I've got a big surprise for you.
translation.it: Non ora, perché ho una grande sorpresa per te.

translation.en: It's not a "hat thing". It's an official headdress for my new job.
translation.it: Non è un coso da cappello. È il copricapo per il mio nuovo lavoro.

translation.en: When we all march up the mountain for the Flower Festival, I'll be in one of the most important spots...
translation.it: Durante la salita del monte al Festival dei Fiori, mi vedranno tutti.

translation.en: Because I've been chosen to be...

translation.it: - Ma in fondo? - È un inizio.

translation.en: -No, it's the opposite, it's the finish. -Still, it's an honor.
translation.it: - No, è la fine. - Comunque, è un onore.
- Come ti hanno scelto? - A caso.

translation.en: You know what would make it even better?
but this is my final chance to make a good impression with the rest of the flummels.
translation.it: ma è la mia ultima chance per fare colpo sugli altri.

translation.en: And don't take this the wrong way, but, please, just try not to ruin this for me.
translation.it: Non avertela a male, ma, ti prego, non rovinare tutto.

translation.en: Well, whenever you help, things tend to... unravel.
translation.it: Ogni volta che mi aiuti le cose… degenerano.

translation.en: Waterfall fail, mango avalanche, rock in the hole,
translation.it: Cascata, valanga di manghi, roccia nel foro,

translation.en: the great fire, the greater fire,
mud for dinner, tree skis, the burpening, fish for hands,
translation.it: fango per cena, sci sugli alberi il rutto, mani di pesce,

translation.en: the ring thing, bee tornado, bee tornado two: the tropical swarm,
translation.it: gli anelli, tornado di api, tornado di api due: lo sciame tropicale

translation.en: and, of course, Coconut Charlie and the Jackfruit Jam Band.
translation.it: e, ovviamente, Charlie Cocco e le marmellatine di giaca.

translation.en: So we've had our ups and downs. Mainly downs.
But think of those sweet, sweet occasional ups.
And besides, you need to stop living in the past...
I just wanted to say, I like that spin move you do.
translation.it: Volevo dirti che mi piace la tua giravolta.

translation.en: Oh, thanks! I call it the "Op Pop".
-I can teach you, if you want. -You could?
Sure! Just do what I do.
Bo, what have I told you about wandering off?
translation.it: Bo, ti avevo detto di non allontanarti?

translation.en: Fred, looking good. You working out?
translation.it: Fred, ti vedo bene. Ti alleni?

translation.en: -Did you change your fur? -I combed it.

translation.it: - A me i fori, gente. - Va bene.

translation.en: Get ready to give your undivided attention to the roundest guy around,
translation.it: Diamo tutti la nostra attenzione al più rotondo che c'è,

translation.en: the king ring of our hoop troop,
Hey, thank you, Mali. Thanks a bunch, great stuff.
Hey, everybody. All right, a little story just before we begin.
Last night, I was doing some thinking, I was doing some math.
translation.it: Ieri sera pensavo, facevo due calcoli.
che questo è il 100° Festival dei Fiori.

translation.en: That guy gets it. I like that guy.
So anywho, I decided our theme this year,
translation.it: Ho deciso che il tema di quest'anno,

translation.en: just like every other year, is...
All right. Cheer time is over.
And as always, I, and the Grand Flower Flummel,
translation.it: E come sempre, io e il Grande Fiore Flummel

translation.en: will lead us right to the top of the mountain to celebrate.
translation.it: vi guideremo fino in cima al monte per festeggiare.

translation.en: big flummels and small flummels, flummels who love the beach,
translation.it: grandi e piccoli, flummel che amano la spiaggia

translation.en: but especially the part where the sand is a little firmer...
translation.it: soprattutto dove la sabbia è più compatta…

translation.en: [grunts] I told you that branch wouldn't hold us. I don't remember you saying that.
translation.it: - L'avevo detto, il ramo non regge. - Non ti ho sentito.

translation.en: We've been demoted to crab poking.
Well, hey, at least you still have your job as the "buddy in the back".
translation.it: Almeno sei ancora il Fiore sul Retro.

translation.en: you're gonna be asked for a lot of dances.
I get nervous talking to girls that aren't you.
I can't even talk to Vinny since he grew his hair long.
translation.it: Anche con Vinny che ha i capelli lunghi.

translation.en: Hey, what's-- Looking good. Looking good.
I wanna hear what's been happening.
Hey, Op, I'm coming. Don't you worry. We haven't talked since yesterday.
translation.it: Arrivo, Op. Tranquilla. Ci siamo visti ieri.

translation.en: So, there's a lot to catch up on.
-First off-- -Uh, he's coming in pretty hot.
translation.it: - Prima di… - Va un po' veloce.

translation.en: Towards the beach. All right, where all the Flummels are working.
translation.it: Verso la spiaggia. Dove lavorano i flummel.

translation.en: Ah, you're right. Better shoo him off a bit.
[Wally] But let's be honest, it's all just swimming.
You can't call it a school and expect kids to be excited about it.
translation.it: La chiami scuola e vuoi che i bambini la amino?

translation.en: -That's the same thing! -No, that was waving.
translation.it: - È lo stesso gesto. - No, lo salutavo.

translation.en: -This is a shooing motion. -No, it isn't.
This is a shooing motion! More like this.
And guess what? Mr. Seahorse is having a baby!
translation.it: Indovina? Il sig. Seahorse è incinta!

translation.en: -This is shooing motion. -That's what I'm doing.
-No, that's waving. -Drinking sea water makes you go crazy.
translation.it: - No, è un saluto. - Ho bevuto troppa acqua di mare.

translation.en: But, really, what else am I supposed to drink?
I know blubber is just what it's called, but that doesn't make it any less hurtful.
translation.it: So che si chiama grasso, ma non è carino.

translation.en: Oh, oh, save the Grand Flower Flummel!
Were you guys waving or shooing?
Oh, you two really did it this time.
I really hope Jepson didn't see that.
translation.it: Spero che Jepson non l'abbia visto.

translation.en: You know, I'm patient. Oh, yes, I am.
But sometimes a leader has to lead.
translation.it: Ma a volte un leader deve guidare.

translation.en: And that is why, Op and Ed,
you are forbidden from coming to the Flower Festival!
translation.it: siete banditi dal Festival dei Fiori!

translation.en: While we go up the mountain, why don't you two take some time and think about what you did...
translation.it: Mentre noi saliamo sul monte rifletterete su ciò che avete fatto

translation.en: Oh, that's why it's called that.
[Ed] And there goes my last chance to belong.
I know this seems bad, but we can--
Don't bother. It's fine. I'm not mad. I'm just...
translation.it: Non ne vale la pena. Va bene. Non sono arrabbiato.

translation.en: [Ed groans] How do you talk me into these things?
I finally understand why this is called
Look, we destroyed all the flowers, right?
So, we're gonna get more flowers no one's ever seen before.
They'll have no choice but to forgive us. Now, come on!
It's just a little bit further-- Whoa!
Op! Oh, no. I knew it!

translation.it: Ho paura, sono bloccato da solo

translation.en: Okay, well... [laughs] just making small talk. Looks like rain. No, it doesn't.
translation.it: Facevo due chiacchiere. Forse piove. Non è vero

translation.en: Whoa, I've never even seen this flower before.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto questo fiore.

translation.en: -I got this. [grunts] -That means I get to name it.
translation.it: - Ho capito. - Scelgo io il nome.

translation.en: -[Ed] No, I don't have this. -Opadils. No, that's stupid.
translation.it: - Non riesco. - Opidea. No, è stupido.

translation.en: You know what? This may actually work.
For sure, this is totally gonna--
-I think I can reach it. -This is my life.
translation.it: - Ce la faccio. - Come mi sono ridotto.

translation.en: [Ed] Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
It is amazing! What do you think it is?
translation.it: È incredibile! Cosa pensi che sia?

translation.en: No idea. I've never seen anything like it.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto niente del genere.

translation.en: [Ed] You think it's some kind of new whale?
[Op] Whale? What are you talking about?
-[Ed] What are you talking about? -What are you talking about?
translation.it: - Ma di cosa parli? - Tu di cosa parli?

translation.en: Op, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about this gorgeous, glowing, swirling--
Oh, okay, not good. Ed! Help! Pull me up. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,
translation.it: Ok, no. Ed! Aiuto! Tirami su.

translation.en: -whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa... -Arms tired from poking crabs.
translation.it: - Ehi! - Ho le braccia stanche dai granchi.

translation.en: We went into a flower on Flummel Island,
then we came out of a flower in this place.
translation.it: poi siamo usciti ed eccoci qui.

translation.en: No, but it's still pretty wild though.
Hmm, where are my mid-distance bifocals?
translation.it: Dove sono i miei occhiali bifocali?

translation.en: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Stop.
How did flower picking turn into...
Don't worry. I can fix this.
Op, that mountain you're on is moving.
translation.it: Op, la montagna su cui sei si muove.

translation.en: We should have never left Desolation Rock.
translation.it: Non dovevamo lasciare la Roccia della desolazione.

translation.en: Your ideas have caused us nothing but trouble.
translation.it: Le tue idee portano solo guai.

translation.en: So, we're doing things my way,
translation.it: Quindi ora facciamo a modo mio,

translation.en: You're the cutest things I've ever seen.
translation.it: Siete la cosa più adorabile del mondo.

translation.en: Do you wanna come home and marry my dolly? And you can marry my cat.
translation.it: Vieni da me e sposi la mia bambola? E tu il mio gatto.

translation.en: Why do you get the cat? I want the cat.
translation.it: Perché tu il gatto? Lo voglio io.

translation.en: -[gasps] It's you again. -Whoa, whoa, whoa! You got it all wrong.
translation.it: - Di nuovo tu. - È stato un malinteso.

translation.en: I'm here to help you guys. Sorry for being so rude back at the house.
translation.it: Voglio aiutarvi. Scusate se sono stato maleducato.

translation.en: We dogs are very territorial, you know.
translation.it: Noi cani siamo territoriali, si sa.

translation.en: -No. We don't know. -We don't know anything.
Well, let's start with the basics then. I'm Clarance and I'm a dog.
translation.it: Iniziamo dalle basi. Sono Clarance e sono un cane.

translation.en: Well, hi, Clarance. I'm Op and this is Ed and we are--
translation.it: Ciao, Clarance. Io sono Op e questo è Ed, siamo…

translation.en: Uh, guys? Wait, wait, no, no. You don't understand. No.
translation.it: Ragazzi? Aspettate, no! Non è come sembra.

translation.en: [man] Oh, cute little doggie. Here you go.
-[door closes] -[gasps] He's gonna eat a flummel!
We won't let you die, brother.
Guys, guys, guys, it's just a donut.
I have to admit, we're pretty delicious.
Yeah. I imagine you guys have a few questions.
You should probably ask "when" are we.
No. We're gonna stick with where are we. Yeah. Where?

translation.it: - No, dove. - Sì, va bene dove.

translation.en: Uh, this will take some visual aid.
Oh, I know just the place to get you some answers. Follow me.
I don't know what these are, but I finally feel like we belong to something.
translation.it: Non so cosa siano, ma mi sento parte di qualcosa.

translation.en: Ugh, it makes my skin crawl.
[pants] What are we looking at here? We found us's.
And as usual, they're ignoring us.
So, what's going on here? Guys, guys, relax.
This is the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.it: Questa è la Sala delle creature estinte.

translation.en: Okay. I mean, the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.it: Ok. La Sala delle creature estinte.

translation.en: Well, you see it began with-- I guess I could--
translation.it: Beh, vedi, è iniziato tutto con… Forse…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, I'll just let this thing do it.
A ship cuts across the sea
That's the thing I saw before we fell into the flower.
translation.it: L'ho vista prima di cadere nel fiore.

translation.en: We are the Beagle of His Majesty's royal fleet.
translation.it: Siamo la Beagle della flotta reale di Sua Maestà.

translation.en: That's Charles Darwin, author of On the Origin of Species.
translation.it: Ecco Charles Darwin, autore di L'origine delle specie.

translation.en: Right now, I'm studying the Galapagos
where I've just discovered a previously unknown island.
translation.it: dove ho scoperto una nuova isola.

translation.en: [man] Unfortunately, the island volcano erupted before they got there.
translation.it: Ma il vulcano dell'isola è esploso prima di raggiungerla.

translation.en: was a single sliver of beach.
That's not even the best part of the beach.
On the island, Darwin discovered the remains
translation.it: Sull'isola, Darwin scoprì i resti di un insolito animale a forma di anello,
Darwin scoprì i resti di un insolito animale a forma di anello,

translation.en: He theorized that the entire flummel species was destroyed by the volcano.
translation.it: Ipotizzò che il vulcano avesse sterminato la specie.
Tutti i Flummelius Hidelia erano morti.

translation.en: It doesn't make any sense. Everyone was just fine.
translation.it: Ma come? Non ha senso. Stavano tutti bene. Eravamo lì.

translation.en: So, we're in the future in a place called "Shanghai".
translation.it: Quindi siamo nel futuro in un posto chiamato "Shanghai"

translation.en: And all of the other flummels are... gone?
translation.it: e tutti gli altri flummel sono morti?

translation.en: No more that guy whose name we don't know.
translation.it: Addio gli altri il cui nome non so.

translation.en: Normally, I'd be excited that we just rhymed.
translation.it: Fa rima, ma non sono felice.

translation.en: Well, worry a little, but either way, stick with the dog.
translation.it: Cioè, un po' sì, ma restate con me.

translation.en: That's Sun, Dr. Chung's wife. Nice lady.
translation.it: Ecco Sun, la moglie del dr. Chung. È gentile.

translation.en: Really knows how to scratch a tummy.
translation.it: È brava a grattare la pancia.

translation.en: Dr. Chung discovered these flowers and used them to travel through time
translation.it: Il dr. Chung scoprì questi fiori con cui viaggiava nel tempo

translation.en: before he got lost somehow, somewhere.
Anyway, the answer to all your problems is right through here. So, come on.
translation.it: La risposta a tutti i vostri problemi è proprio qui. Dai.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. I'm not going through that thing again. What if we end up Dr. Chung-ed?
translation.it: Io non ci ritorno. Se finiamo come il dr. Chung?

translation.en: Okay. Paws, but front paws, get it?
Thanks to me, Sun hasn't even noticed that Dr. Chung is missing.
translation.it: Grazie a me, Sun non sa che il marito è scomparso.

translation.en: A place neither in the past nor the future.
translation.it: Né nel passato né nel futuro.

translation.en: Dr. Chung discovered that each one of these portals
translation.it: Il dr. Chung ha scoperto che questi portali

translation.en: leads to a different time flower somewhere in history.
translation.it: portano a diversi Fiori del tempo nella storia.
È Mozart, il genio della musica.

translation.en: And now he's just showing off.
All we have to do is find the seed that activates the Galapagos portal,
translation.it: Troviamo il seme del portale delle Galapagos

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home.
No, home before the volcanic explosion,
translation.it: No, prima dell'esplosione, così possiamo avvertire tutti.
No, prima dell'esplosione, così possiamo avvertire tutti. Avvertirli?

translation.en: How are the flummels gonna trust us with their lives when they don't even trust us with their flowers?
translation.it: Come faranno a crederci se non si fidano neanche a lasciarci i fiori?

translation.en: Remember when I told you "look to the future"?
translation.it: Ti ho detto "guarda al futuro", no?

translation.en: This is that future because we're the only ones
translation.it: Beh, eccolo, siamo gli unici che possono salvare i flummel dall'estinzione.

translation.en: who can save the flummels from extinction.
translation.it: siamo gli unici che possono salvare i flummel dall'estinzione.

translation.en: So, forget fitting in. We're gonna stand out... as heroes.
translation.it: Non facciamoci accettare. Distinguiamoci come eroi.

translation.en: But if we're gonna do this, we have to do it right.
translation.it: Ma dobbiamo fare le cose per bene.

translation.en: -Not this one or this one. Not this one. -[worried grunting]
No, actually, I'm doing it all right.
-[electrical hissing] -I found it! I found the seed for it.
translation.it: L'ho trovato! Ho trovato il seme.

translation.en: Maybe we're supposed to be extinct.
This is horrible. I got to get out of here. Oh.
I'm Ernest Shackleton, head of the Ernest Shackleton Expedition.
translation.it: Sono Ernest Shackleton della spedizione Ernest Shackleton.

translation.en: Now, don't worry, you're with friends, part of a team, team Ernest Shackleton.
translation.it: Tranquillo, sei tra amici e nella squadra di Ernest Shackleton.

translation.en: Hello. I'm Clarance. And you are?
translation.it: Ciao. Sono Clarance. E voi siete?

translation.en: [all] We are all here to serve Master.
translation.it: Siamo qui per servire il padrone.

translation.en: What are you two? Monsters? Space aliens?
We're none of those things. We're Op and Ed, we're--
translation.it: No. Siamo Op ed Ed, siamo…

translation.en: They appear to be a pair of flummels, Flummelios Hidella, to be exact.
The Germans refer to them as... [speaking German]
They all went extinct in the early 19th century.
translation.it: Ma si sono estinti nel 19° secolo.

translation.en: My anxious friend here is Burnie, and he's a Tasmanian tiger,
translation.it: L'ansioso qui è Burnie, un tilacino,

translation.en: and Alma is a meridian gelada.
They're new and small and new.
And this is Hoss. He's from the Cretaceous Period.
translation.it: E questo è Hoss. Viene dal Cretaceo,

translation.en: So, he's millions of years old, but also he's only five.
translation.it: ha milioni di anni, ma in realtà solo cinque.

translation.en: We'd be happy to tell you all about everything.
We have a nice glossy brochure or...
So you're wondering what it means To be an extinctable
translation.it: Vuoi sapere che vuol dir Estinguibile

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid the answer Starts with the unthinkable
But lucky for us Dr. Chung arrived
translation.it: Ma il dr. Chung ci salvò

translation.en: He brought us here Where it's safe and warm
translation.it: Ci portò qui Al bel calduccio

translation.en: And sheltered us from major storm
Now we call this strange place home
And honestly prefer not to roam
We know staying here Feels like a crime
When we could explore anyplace in time Like 4 BC or NYC
translation.it: Quando potremmo viaggiare in continuazione Il 4. a.C., gli USA
Tokyo, la Grecia o i Pirenei

translation.en: Maybe visit Pompeii Before it went to rubble
Nope This place is not worth the trouble
But the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.it: Il mondo è pericoloso La vita è ingiusta

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.it: Qui sarà un po' noioso Ma non ti fanno la festa

translation.en: There's plague and famine Germs by the pound Virus and disease No cure to be found
translation.it: Pestilenze, carestie e germi Virus, malattie e tanti infermi

translation.en: There's wars and swords And tyrants abound Aliens, Bigfoot The Earth isn't round
translation.it: - Guerre, spade e armi - Alieni, Bigfoot, terrapiattisti

translation.en: Get crushed, blown up Or fall deathly ill
For the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.it: Il mondo è pericoloso La vita ingiusta

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.it: Qui sarà un po' noioso Ma non ti fanno la festa

translation.en: The bulldog rat, the Aztec cat
translation.it: Bulldog era il ratto, azteco il gatto

translation.en: Giant goose and the great stag moose
translation.it: L'oca gigante e l'alce molto grande

translation.en: The large sloth lemur The Pleistocene beaver
The Russian retriever Guys, I wish you could've seen it
'Cause no matter the name They're all out of the game
translation.it: Ma si sono estinti, è palese

translation.en: It's a Japanese sea lion crying shame
It could happen any year In any hemisphere
If you wanna stay safe Best stay right here
translation.it: Qui sei al sicuro da ogni danno

translation.en: For the world's full of danger
You can kill time here or
Time can kill you out there
translation.it: Ma non ti fanno la festa

translation.en: You know, I feel Clarance would've really gotten a kick out of that.
It all happened so fast. Uh, the portals just went crazy
translation.it: È successo così in fretta. I portali sono impazziti

translation.en: and... and then Clarance flew away...
This is a new record, Op.
We've been here all of ten minutes, and everybody already hates us.
translation.it: Siamo qui da dieci minuti e ci odiano già tutti.

translation.en: It's fine. It'll all be fine. Ed and I will get Clarance and the seed back.
translation.it: Andrà tutto bene. Ed e io recupereremo Clarance e il seme.

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but there's no telling where
translation.it: È impossibile sapere dove o quando

translation.en: Not to mention, he may be taken by body snatchers, boogeymen, Cyclopses.
translation.it: Se non l'hanno preso gli ultracorpi, l'uomo nero, i ciclopi.

translation.en: Burnie. The point is, Clarance could be anywhere, literally.
Doesn't he have to be in one of those places?
translation.it: Ma in uno di questi posti, no?

translation.en: to these dozens of unknown and dangerous places
in hopes of stumbling across Clarance by sheer dumb luck?
Sounds like a plan to me.
Did she say "dangerous"? Did you say "dangerous"?
Hello, sir. Have you seen a cute little doggy around here?
translation.it: Salve, ha visto un cagnolino adorabile?

translation.en: No sign of Clarance, and we almost got killed. This is why I don't like to travel.
translation.it: Siamo quasi morti, ma niente Clarance. Ecco perché odio viaggiare.

translation.en: Come on, Ed. We've got a lot more places to check,
Hi, me. Oh, no. There's a hole right through me.
translation.it: Ciao, me. No, ho un buco.

translation.en: [laughs] Just messing. I know that's how I look.
translation.it: Scherzo. So che sono fatta così.

translation.en: Bound to be the eventual death of me?
Okay, Ed. I've got a great feeling about this next portal.
[laughs] That lady really didn't like us trying on her hat.
translation.it: Non voleva che provassimo il suo cappello.
- Ma dai? - La corona di Cleopatra.

translation.en: History must be a non-stop adventure. What's it like out there?
translation.it: La storia sarà un'avventura senza fine. Com'è là fuori?

translation.en: It's amazing. Each place is more exciting than the last.
translation.it: Incredibile. Ogni posto è meglio del precedente.

translation.en: you do not want to leave here where it's safe.
translation.it: non vuoi andartene da qui, siamo al sicuro.

translation.en: And Op, he's just a kid.
translation.it: E Op, è solo un bambino.

translation.en: You should stop putting ideas in his head.
translation.it: Smettila di fargli venire strane idee.

translation.en: But I want ideas in my head.
I'm so cooped up in here.
I know what will knock the glum right outta ya.
translation.it: Ti tiro su io di morale.

translation.en: Live from inside Dr. Chung's mobile greenhouse,
translation.it: In diretta della serra mobile del dr. Chung,

translation.en: First, I'll need a common household item.
translation.it: Per prima cosa, mi serve un oggetto comune.

translation.en: Now, I place the object between the two Time Flowers
translation.it: Ora metto l'oggetto tra i due Fiori del tempo

translation.en: Where'd it go? Where'd it go?
It'll be back in three, two, one, and...
translation.it: Tornerà tra tre, due, uno e…

translation.en: A magician never reveals his secrets.
translation.it: Un mago non rivela mai i suoi segreti.

translation.en: The merging of two Time Flowers
causes an extremely powerful arc that disassembles the atoms of an item, sends them into a time loop,
translation.it: si forma un arco che manda gli atomi di un oggetto in un loop temporale

translation.en: then reassembles the item at a different point in time.
translation.it: e li riassembla in un altro punto del tempo.

translation.en: All we do, we do for Master.
Well, uh, I think I heard Master say
translation.it: Beh, credo di aver sentito il padrone dire

translation.en: you two should snap my leash so I can go free.
[sighs] This did not go how I hoped.
But I do see a pretty good wall.
On second thought, a great wall.
Imagine if we brought these back to the flummels. [laughs]
translation.it: Pensa se riportiamo questi ai flummel.

translation.en: We have a lot of mess ahead of us, and you keep making the mess messier.
translation.it: Ci mancano ancora tanti casini e tu continui a fare casino.

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with you. You just don't think things through.
translation.it: Non hai nulla che non va. È che sei impulsiva.

translation.en: I mean, we've been lucky so far, but one of these days, you're gonna get someone hurt,
translation.it: Finora abbiamo avuto fortuna, ma prima o poi qualcuno si farà male.

translation.en: From now on, we don't do anything unless we're both onboard.
translation.it: Faremo qualcosa solo se siamo d'accordo entrambi.

translation.en: It's been a while. You do think they're okay out there?
translation.it: È passato un po'. Dici che stanno bene?

translation.en: Barely. Those sky flowers tried to kill us.
translation.it: A malapena. I fiori del cielo volevano ucciderci.

translation.en: These are fireworks. The Chinese invented them.
They also invented the gunpowder inside them.
translation.it: Come la polvere da sparo all'interno.

translation.en: They came from the Qianlong Coronation.
So... where you two going next?
If that's the one you want, then I love it.
translation.it: Se è quello che vuoi, va bene.

translation.en: Let's hope it's the right one, for the flummels' sake.
translation.it: Speriamo sia quello giusto, per amor di flummel.

translation.en: They have no idea our entire species is doomed.
translation.it: Non sanno che siamo spacciati come specie.

translation.en: I can't believe you guys found me. You're better explorers than this Shackleton guy.
translation.it: Mi avete trovato. Siete più bravi di Shackleton a esplorare.

translation.en: Oh, you'll be happy to know I kept this safe.
-Good. What's the plan? -Yeah. What's the plan?
No, no, no. She wouldn't abandon us. We just talked about this.
translation.it: No, non lo farebbe mai. Ne abbiamo parlato.

translation.en: And Op just promised me that she wouldn't do this kind of thing anymore.
translation.it: E mi ha promesso che non avrebbe più fatto queste cose.

translation.en: She'll be back. She's probably just gonna just--
Okay. She might have abandoned us.
Op runs off, and I'm left pounding a rock.
translation.it: Op se ne va e io martello con una roccia.

translation.en: Hoss, see that shiny necklace on Clarance?
translation.it: Hoss, vedi la collana di Clarance?

translation.en: [all] You broke Master's chain. No one betrays Master.
translation.it: Hai rotto la catena del padrone. Nessuno tradisce il padrone.

translation.en: We can't get home without that seed. Hoss, circle back around.
translation.it: Non possiamo tornare senza. Hoss, torna indietro.

translation.en: Back into the Time Flower, Hoss, and step on it.
translation.it: Al fiore del tempo, Hoss, veloce.

translation.en: Do you know how to play this game?
Hey, have you guys seen Hoss?
-[piano keys clang off-key] -[Mozart] Was ist das?
Oh. Okay. We got Clarance. We got the seed. We--
You almost got him extinct. Not to mention the rest of us.
translation.it: L'hai quasi fatto estinguere. Noi idem.

translation.en: That's right, you didn't think, and you didn't listen.
translation.it: Esatto, non hai pensato né ascoltato.

translation.en: Even though you looked me in the eye
and promised me that you wouldn't do anything unless we were both onboard.
translation.it: che dovevamo essere d'accordo entrambi prima di fare qualcosa.

translation.en: All this time I thought I never fit in with the flummels because there was something wrong with me.
translation.it: Credevo che i flummel non mi accettassero per un problema mio.

translation.en: I'm saying that my life would be better off without you!
translation.it: Che la mia vita sarebbe migliore senza di te!

translation.en: I'm sure he just needs some time to cool off.
And he is better off without me.
But there's one thing I can still do.
-I'm going back to warn the flummels. -Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
I'm not sure you should go without Ed.
I'd just end up causing him more trouble, and I've caused him enough trouble already.
translation.it: Lo metterei solo nei guai e gliene ho già causati troppi.

translation.en: If I can pull this off, then Ed will have a community to go home to.
translation.it: Se ci riesco, Ed avrà una comunità a cui tornare.

translation.en: at least I can't hurt him again.
[Mali] You know, you're also a great leader on the dance floor.
translation.it: Sai, sei un leader anche sulla pista da ballo.

translation.en: Thanks, Mali. You've said that about five times already.
translation.it: Grazie, Mali. È la quinta volta che lo dici!

translation.en: little reminder, this is the Flower Festival.
translation.it: punto primo, questo è il Festival dei Fiori.

translation.en: Second reminder, you've been banned from the Flower Festival.
translation.it: Punto secondo, sei stata bandita dal Festival dei Fiori.

translation.en: I don't have time for the whole story, but I need everyone's attention.
translation.it: È una lunga storia, non ho tempo, ma ascoltatemi.

translation.en: I am trying to get my kids to sleep in here.
translation.it: Sto cercando di far addormentare i miei figli.

translation.en: -[baby crying] -Oh, now, I'm up all night.
I just returned from the future. and I learned that in the past,
translation.it: Ho viaggiato nel futuro e ho scoperto che nel passato,

translation.en: and by the past I mean now,
our entire species is about to stop existing.
translation.it: la nostra specie sta per scomparire.

translation.en: So, if we're going to live to see the future,
we have to do something now,
We're all about to go extinct.
Everyone, I promise you. Op, you're being ridiculous.
translation.it: Ve lo prometto. Op, è ridicolo.

translation.en: That's why I made this face because you're ridiculous.
translation.it: Faccio questa faccia perché è ridicolo.

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't drag me into this.
Look, here's proof I was in the future.
translation.it: Ecco la prova che ero nel futuro.

translation.en: -Why did I think this would work? -[screams]
translation.it: Cosa mi è saltato in mente?

translation.en: Wow, you really let her have it.
Remind me to never get on your bad side.
But don't you think you were maybe a little bit hard on her?
translation.it: Ma non credi di essere stato un po' duro con lei?

translation.en: She is your sister after all.
No. It's been like this our whole lives.
Maybe I shouldn't have said it out loud,
translation.it: Forse non avrei dovuto dirlo ad alta voce,

translation.en: My life would be much better without her.
translation.it: La mia vita sarebbe migliore senza di lei.

translation.en: This is a place of withouts.
We all live here without our families, without friends.
translation.it: Siamo privati delle nostre famiglie, degli amici.

translation.en: Sometimes, I think, without really living at all.
translation.it: A volte mi sembra di non vivere nemmeno.

translation.en: But I can tell you this,
life is really tough when you're all by yourself.
...messing. I know that's how I look. [chuckles]
Hey, Ed. Ed, are you seeing this?
Could someone give me a hand with this?
Hey, check it out, I'm the friend at the end.
translation.it: Guarda, sono il Fiore alla Fine.

translation.en: Hey, Wally, get over here, buddy.
I have to talk to Op.
I wanted to ask Op if she'd sign it, too,
but she left in kind of a hurry.
translation.it: ma se n'è andata in fretta.

translation.en: I think she said something about going home.
translation.it: Credo parlasse di tornare a casa.

translation.en: Gave us a lot to think about. But let's be honest, truthful, real truthful,
translation.it: Ottimi spunti di riflessione. Ma guardiamoci in faccia.

translation.en: you never went to the future. -[Clarance] Yes, she did. -[all gasp]
translation.it: - Non sei mai stata nel futuro. - Sì, invece.

translation.en: And I can attest to it.
I don't know, but sick do.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma gran chioma.

translation.en: I'm a dog, part poodle, part--it's hard to know. My mother was very social.
translation.it: Sono un cane, mezzo barboncino, mezzo… non so, mia madre era amichevole.

translation.en: [gasps] You came! You've gotta tell the flummels they're in trouble.
translation.it: Sei qui! Di' loro che sono nei guai.

translation.en: Oh, they most certainly are in trouble...
Hey, wait! Where are you going?
Okay. So, she might have been telling the truth.
And why did you do this?
Hate, hate, hate, hate, hate hate, hate! Flummels ruined my life!
translation.it: Vi odio! I flummel mi hanno rovinato la vita.

translation.en: I was a puppy once, adorable and spunky,
translation.it: Ero un cucciolo adorabile e intrepido

translation.en: just waiting for a family to take me home.
But unfortunately, I lived in a world of flummels.
translation.it: Ma il mondo era pieno di flummel.

translation.en: And flummels were the most popular pet in the world.
translation.it: E i flummel erano l'animale più gettonato al mondo.
Volevano tutti le stupide ciambelle pelose.

translation.en: I get it. Nobody wanted a dog with a stomach.
translation.it: Ho capito. Nessuno vuole un cane con la pancia.

translation.en: But then, one day, my luck changed.
translation.it: Ma un giorno la ruota girò.

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] He's perfect. I'll take him.
[Clarance] I couldn't believe it. This man wanted me.
translation.it: Non ci credevo. Quest'uomo voleva me.

translation.en: And he even loved me enough to give me a name.
translation.it: Mi voleva bene e mi diede un nome.

translation.en: You're coming home with me, Clarance.
translation.it: Verrai a casa con me, Clarance.

translation.en: [Clarance] I was expecting a warm bed, and a fresh pile of newspapers.
translation.it: Mi aspettavo un letto caldo e una pila di giornali.
Seduto. Ma fu ancora meglio di così.

translation.en: -I got something better. -[Dr. Chung] Good boy.
translation.it: Ma fu ancora meglio di così. Bravo.

translation.en: [Clarance] It was then that I realized I was more than just a pet.
translation.it: Allora capii che non ero solo un cane.

translation.en: I was a part of science.
[man] It's the top of the fifth inning as the Bambino steps to the plate. He's calling a homerun shot.
translation.it: Quinto inning, il Bambino alla battuta. Dichiara un home run.

translation.en: He's pointing to a dog on a tiny little car.
translation.it: Indica un cane su una macchinina.

translation.en: Oh, Doctor, I don't believe it.
I finally felt I belonged somewhere,
adventuring through time and history together.
[Clarance] But then, one day, we traveled to 1835,
translation.it: Ma poi, un giorno, andammo nel 1835,

translation.en: And there we found a bunch of these stupid napkin rings.
[Clarance] Dr. Chung told me this was when Darwin first discovered flummels
translation.it: Il dr. Chung mi disse che Darwin scoprì i flummel

translation.en: and introduced them to the rest of the world.
translation.it: e li fece conoscere al resto del mondo.

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] Oh, my goodness, look at you.
He was gonna love flummels more than me.
translation.it: Avrebbe amato i flummel più di me.

translation.en: And then it hit me. I didn't have to accept the course of history.
translation.it: Ma poi ebbi un'idea. Non dovevo accettare la storia.

translation.en: Ready for our next adventure, Clarance?
[Clarance] Yeah, that's right. I turned on my master.
translation.it: Sì, mi sono ribellato al mio padrone.

translation.en: I pushed him though a portal and made sure he could never come back.
translation.it: L'ho spinto in un portale e ho fatto in modo che non tornasse.

translation.en: After that, there was nothing stopping me from coming back here
translation.it: A quel punto potevo venire qui senza problemi
a distruggere tutta la tua specie.

translation.en: Now, back to some smooth jazz.
[Clarance] It was a quick trip, but I got a lot done that day.
And it was all a done deal until you two hula-hoops showed up.
translation.it: Era andato tutto liscio, ma poi siete arrivati voi due hula-hoop.

translation.en: But it's all about to be fixed, because your brother is back with the other cowards
translation.it: Ma andrà tutto bene, tuo fratello è con i codardi

translation.en: who never leave their precious, little Time Terminal.
translation.it: che non lasciano mai il Terminal temporale.

translation.en: And you're not getting off this island alive.
translation.it: Tu non uscirai viva da quest'isola.

translation.en: That's more time than I thought. I mean it's not a lot of time but--
translation.it: Più di quanto pensassi. Non è molto, ma…

translation.en: Yeah. I meant to only set it for three. These stupid clumsy paws.
translation.it: Dovevano essere tre minuti. Dannate zampone.

translation.en: You know what, it don't matter.
You've got a front row seat to your species' and your own extinction.
translation.it: Assisterai in prima fila all'estinzione tua e della tua specie.

translation.en: She's too funny to stay mad at.
translation.it: Fa troppo ridere, non sono arrabbiato.

translation.en: I just returned with the last Tasmanian tiger on Earth.
translation.it: Sono appena tornato con l'ultimo tilacino sulla Terra.

translation.en: It scratched me up pretty good.
What? I don't get into cars with strangers.
translation.it: Come? Non accetto passaggi dagli sconosciuti.

translation.en: [gasps] That's the day he went missing.
translation.it: Il giorno in cui è scomparso.

translation.en: Today, I'm visiting one of my heroes, the great explorer, Zheng-He.
translation.it: Vado a trovare uno dei miei eroi, il grande esploratore, Zheng-He.

translation.en: He created one of the first nautical maps ever.
translation.it: È sua una delle prime mappe nautiche.

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe I'll even get to see him drawing it up.
translation.it: Magari lo vedrò mentre la disegna.

translation.en: -1417, he said 1417. -[Dr. Chung] Okay. We know where he went now.
[Dr. Chung] Ready for your next adventure, Clarance?
What kind of conspiracy nut am I if I didn't see that coming?
But we could still save Dr. Chung if we just use whatever seeds...
translation.it: Possiamo ancora salvarlo se usiamo il seme…

translation.en: Oh, I can't believe we finally know where Dr. Chung is,
translation.it: Finalmente sappiamo dov'è il dr. Chung,

translation.en: and there's no way to bring him back.
No, no. Dr. Chung said he was going to 1417, remember?
translation.it: No, il dr. Chung ha detto che andava al 1417, ricordi?

translation.en: which means he probably joined his expedition to Malacca, 1418,
translation.it: quindi sarà con lui nella spedizione a Malacca del 1418
per cui c'è un Fiore del tempo.

translation.en: We just need some sort of beacon to lead him to it.
We should also give him the brochure.
I'm so sorry, I didn't mean...
A volcano didn't make us extinct.
and now he's trapped the others in the cave, and he trapped me against this tree and...
translation.it: Ha intrappolato tutti nella caverna e me qui…

translation.en: because we both didn't agree that it is.
I was so wrong to say what I said,
translation.it: Ho sbagliato a dire quelle cose

translation.en: and I want you to know that I didn't mean it.
translation.it: e devi sapere che non le pensavo.

translation.en: All you've ever done is support me,
and my life would be nothing without you.
translation.it: e la mia vita sarebbe orribile senza te.

translation.en: What are you talking about? I can't do anything right.
translation.it: Ma cosa dici? Non ne azzecco una.

translation.en: You know it. I know it, the rest of the flummels certainly know it and--
translation.it: Lo sappiamo tu, io, il resto dei flummel e…

translation.en: Who cares what the flummels think?
translation.it: Chi se ne importa di loro.

translation.en: I've spent so long worried about fitting in with all the other flummels
translation.it: Ero così impegnato a farmi accettare dagli altri flummel

translation.en: that I never even noticed this is where I fit in best.
translation.it: da non vedere che mi sentivo già a mio agio.

translation.en: Come on, I screw up all the time.
But if it weren't for your screw-ups,
then we would've never even fallen through that flower.
translation.it: non saremmo mai caduti nel fiore.

translation.en: And thanks to you, we have a chance to rescue our species from extinction.
translation.it: E grazie a te, possiamo salvare la nostra specie dall'estinzione.

translation.en: because they'd do the same thing for us if it were the other way around.
translation.it: perché farebbero lo stesso per noi.

translation.en: [sighs] You think you can get me out of this thing?
No problem. There's only a million combinations here.
translation.it: Certo. Saranno solo un milione di combinazioni.

translation.en: Next time I poke you, it's gonna be a lot softer.
Come on, Op, we're not gonna let that adorable maniac get away with this.
translation.it: Forza, Op, quell'adorabile maniaco non la scamperà.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. It can't be.
-Why won't these flummels just die? -[glass shatters]
translation.it: Perché i flummel non muoiono e basta?

translation.en: Looks like I may need some help.
How much time before the bomb goes off?

translation.it: Estinzione dei flummel tra nove minuti.

translation.en: I know it wants to kill us but you have to admit, it is helpful.
translation.it: So che vuole ucciderci, ma devi ammetterlo, è utile.

translation.en: Don't worry. You'll be long gone by then.
What are you gonna do, fuzzball?
There's only one you and two us's.
And in case you were wondering if ancient Greek monsters are real, they were.
translation.it: E sì, i mostri dell'antica Grecia sono veramente esistiti.

translation.en: Okay, Greg, you know what to do.
I just drove for the first time and so far, I've only hit one pedestrian.
translation.it: È la mia prima volta al volante e ho investito solo un pedone.

translation.en: The best decision I've made in a long time.
Crikey, that one eye makes for pretty poor depth perception. He couldn't hit the broadside of a Hoss.
translation.it: Con quell'occhio non vede la profondità. Non centrerebbe neanche Hoss.

translation.en: Hey, Cyclops, bet you can't hit me. -Bet you can't hit me. -Hmm?
translation.it: Ciclope, scommetto che non mi colpisci.

translation.en: Need a target? Hundred points if you get it through the bull's-eye.
translation.it: Vuoi un bersaglio? Cento punti se fai centro.

translation.en: -Hey, put some sauce on that meatball. -[all taunting]
translation.it: Occhio a polpetta. Dai, stupidotto! Forza!
No! Fermati, idiota con un occhio solo!

translation.en: He is a very, very, very ugly wet-looking dog.
So, I spent a lot of my cave time thinking about you two,
translation.it: Ho pensato molto a voi due mentre ero nella caverna

translation.en: and what I would do if we ever got out of there alive.
translation.it: e a cosa avrei fatto se fossi sopravvissuto.

translation.en: You think maybe we could do this later?
The whole island is about to blow up.

translation.it: Estinzione dei flummel tra sette minuti.

translation.en: The only thing we can do.
and then we do whatever they say.
The ship, that's Charles Darwin, the man from the museum movie.
translation.it: Quello è Charles Darwin, l'uomo del film del museo.

translation.en: [gasps] If we make it to the beach, he might be able to save us.
translation.it: Se arriviamo in spiaggia, potrebbe salvarci.

translation.en: Wait, I know what that means, and it's good.
translation.it: Aspetta, so cosa significa ed è positivo.

translation.en: Is something wrong with them? They don't have any holes.
translation.it: Che problema hanno? Non hanno il buco.

translation.en: Jepson, you get everyone to the beach.
We'll meet you there after we get Darwin's attention with the sky flowers.
translation.it: Noi chiamiamo Darwin coi fiori del cielo.

translation.en: Uh, but these flummels haven't been sanitized.
Wait. I just wanna say thanks for everything,
and try not to fall to your death.
What do you think I am, a dodo?
Oh, because they look like flowers in the sky.
Hey, tell whoever came up with that name, great job.
translation.it: Chiunque abbia inventato quel nome, ottimo lavoro.

translation.en: Can we go? Please, please, please, please, please?
[sighs] Fine. But this is the last island.
translation.it: Va bene. Ma questa è l'ultima isola.

translation.en: He sees us! Op and Ed did it!
translation.it: Ci ha visti! Op ed Ed ce l'hanno fatta!

translation.en: Whoa, that felt weird to say.
Ah, now, that's the Op and Ed I know.
Yeah, who'd have thought our aim would be too good?
translation.it: Come potevamo sapere che avevamo troppa mira?

translation.en: You don't wanna eat us. Just eat me. Let Ed live.
translation.it: Non mangiarci. Mangia me, ma non Ed.

translation.en: -Hmm? -[Ed] That's nice what you said out there, you know, outside of the mouth.
translation.it: Hai detto una cosa carina prima, fuori dalla bocca.

translation.en: I hope he swallows me first just so you can live a little longer.
translation.it: Spero ingoi prima me così vivrai un po' di più.

translation.en: [Ed] I hope he swallows me first.
I don't wanna see you swallowed.
We're alive and smell like Cyclops's breath.
translation.it: Siamo vivi e puzziamo di alito di Ciclope.

translation.en: Behind that big eye is an even bigger heart.
translation.it: Hai un grande occhio, ma un cuore ancora più grande.

translation.en: And by the way, you have a cavity.
Op, I don't think that ship is gonna get here in time to save us.
translation.it: Op, dubito che la nave arriverà in tempo per salvarci.

translation.en: [Ed] So the Cyclops will throw us to the Time Flower, we'll take it to the beach,
translation.it: Il Ciclope ci lancia nel Fiore del tempo, lo portiamo in spiaggia

translation.en: and we'll take everyone through it before the bomb goes off.
Hey, you can do it, big guy. We believe in you.
Nice aim, Greg. You're a natural.
If I didn't know any better, I'd say these creatures are trying to communicate with us.
translation.it: Se fossi ingenuo, direi che quegli animali vogliono dirci qualcosa.

translation.en: Perhaps they're adapting to the changes around them in order to survive.
translation.it: Si staranno adattando ai cambiamenti per sopravvivere.

translation.en: Almost as if they're, I don't know, evolving or something.
translation.it: Come se stessero evolvendo o che ne so.

translation.en: and there's only gonna be one survivor, and that's me.
translation.it: e ci sarà un solo sopravvissuto: io.

translation.en: So, hand over that Time Flower.
-Nice Op Hop. -I learned from the best.
translation.it: - Bell'Op Pop. - Ho imparato dalla migliore.

translation.en: Dang, I always forget about this cliff.
I might have one, and it's kind of an Op idea.
translation.it: Forse ne ho una ed è un'idea alla Op.

translation.en: You almost got us killed, Ed.
Is this how I make you feel all the time?
translation.it: È così che ti faccio sentire?

translation.en: Time Flowers. How many times did you hit your head on the way down?
translation.it: Fiori del tempo. Quante volte hai battuto la testa?

translation.en: Okay. Great. Now we have three Time Flowers. What good does-- [gasps]
translation.it: Fantastico, tre Fiori del tempo. A che serve…

translation.en: Something other than lighting a boat on fire.
translation.it: Che non sia incendiare una nave.

translation.en: -Do you think this will work? -I have no idea.
translation.it: - Pensi che funzionerà? - Non lo so.

translation.en: I got to get this bomb away from me.
translation.it: Devo allontanare la bomba da me.
- Per lo stufato del Re! - Per il polpettone di Maestà!

translation.en: my great-great-grandfather sailed here with the one and only Charles Darwin.
translation.it: il mio trisavolo salpò qui col mitico Charles Darwin.

translation.en: He claimed that there was an island here that exploded and completely vanished.
translation.it: Secondo lui qui c'era un'isola che è esplosa e scomparsa.

translation.en: Yeah. I think I had a relative that did something like that, too.
translation.it: Sì, anche un mio parente ha fatto una cosa simile.
- Per lo stufato del Re! - Per il polpettone di Maestà!

translation.en: Oh, or at least I'm alive.
Oh! Hoss and everybody, you're alive!
Yes, thanks to Op and Ed,
translation.it: Sì, grazie a Op ed Ed,

translation.en: So... were you worried about me?
Burnie's trick on a grand scale. We used every Time Flower we could find
translation.it: Il trucco di Burnie su grande scala usando ogni Fiore del tempo che c'era

translation.en: to make the whole island disappear before the boat went off.
translation.it: per far sparire l'isola prima dell'esplosione.

translation.en: I was right about the flowers and the Cyclops.
translation.it: Avevo ragione sui fiori e sui Ciclopi.

translation.en: What else am I right about?
I'll just get back in that flower, and I'll keep trying again and again
translation.it: Tornerò in quel fiore e continuerò a provare

translation.en: You've been a very bad dog, Clarance.

translation.it: - Non è neanche l'inizio. - Sdraiati. Quando avrò…

translation.en: Oh, it's so good to see you and you, and you, and...
I think you should be asking "when" are--
Today, we celebrate the one-year anniversary of the greatest discovery of the 21st century,
translation.it: È il primo anniversario della più grande scoperta del 21° secolo,

translation.en: a species once thought extinct, flummels.
translation.it: una specie ritenuta estinta, i flummel.
Sì, gli adorabili, dolcissimi, tenerissimi flummel

translation.en: brought to us by famed botanical astrophysicist, Dr. Lee Chung.
translation.it: scoperti dal noto astrofisico botanico dr. Lee Chung.

translation.en: A recent survey shows that the average...
Oh, I'm so proud of you, Lee.
And you've been so much more talkative since your discovery.
translation.it: E sei molto più loquace dalla scoperta.

translation.en: Friend at the end again, eh? Nope.
translation.it: - Di nuovo Fiore alla Fine? - No.

translation.en: Aww, and all without my help.
You and Dr. Chung visit any cool places lately?
translation.it: Tu e il dr. Chung avete visto bei posti?

translation.en: It's been one amazing adventure after another.
[Ed] What did you guys end up doing with Clarance?
translation.it: Che ne avete fatto di Clarance?

translation.en: No dog should have a master.
translation.it: Nessun cane deve avere un padrone.

translation.en: So, on the count of three, I say we tie up Shackleton, take his ship,
translation.it: Quindi, al tre, leghiamo Shackleton, gli rubiamo la nave

translation.en: and head somewhere warm like Cabo.
translation.it: e andiamo al calduccio, tipo a Cabo.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. We can change it up.

translation.it: Le Fiji? San Diego? Roma? Parigi?

translation.en: They let dogs in the restaurants there. [yelps]
translation.it: I cani sono ammessi al ristorante.

translation.en: Ready or not, Hoss, here I come.
And thanks for helping out, pals.
Well, how do you like this year's two flower floats?
translation.it: Vi piacciono le due statue floreali di quest'anno?

translation.en: -[Op] Great. -[Ed] I look a little chunky.
I'm sorry your teeth are yellow. We ran out of white flowers.
translation.it: Scusa per i denti gialli, i fiori bianchi erano finiti.

translation.en: Hey, Ed, I have a little surprise for you. Come with me.
translation.it: Ed, ho una sorpresa per te. Seguimi.

translation.en: Except I just remembered that I don't,
so tell me what it is so I'm not too surprised.
Don't worry, Ed. I'm sure you have plenty of time to prepare for--
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, Ed. Avrai tempo per prepararti…

translation.en: Op, I really don't know if I could handle another surprise today.
translation.it: Op, non credo di poter sopportare un'altra sorpresa.

translation.en: Trust me. You're gonna love it.
Hey, I haven't seen you since, what, like 1835?
There's so much to talk about.
You two keep going. I'll go get him a glass of water.
translation.it: Continuate pure. Gli porto da bere.
